protein.specific_function: Mediates hepatobiliary excretion of numerous organic anions. May function as a cellular cisplatin transporter

go_class.description: atpase activity, coupled to transmembrane movement of substances
hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides
hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides, in phosphorus-containing anhydrides
